186490.「遅れて 申し訳ありませぬ。 \n ……ですが さすがは <cs_pchero>:
Sorry for the delay. But as expected of
<cs_pchero>. It seems you've already defeated
the demon.

186491.「おい 父ちゃん！\n 遅刻するなんて かっこ悪りぃぞ！: Hey, Dad! It's not cool to be late!

186492.「なっ……！ ルビー！！\n 村で 兵士たちと 待っていなさいと\n 言っただろ:
Wha...! Ruby! I told you to wait in the
village with the soldiers!

186493.「あんな 何もねぇ村で\n じっとなんか してられるか。: I can't just sit around in that empty village.

186494.「……やれやれ 困ったものです。 \n 闇の領界に 着いてすぐに こいつが\n:
...Sheesh, what a bother. I caught her
following me as soon as I arrived in the Dark
Realm.

186495.「何度も 戻るようにと 言ったのですが\n ちっとも 聞きやしない。\n そのせ:
I told her several times to go back home, but
she wouldn't listen. That's why I was so
late...

186496.「……ったく 協団ってのは あれもダメ\n これもダメって うるさいよなあ。:
...Everyone at the cooperative was so noisy,
saying "Don't do this" and "Don't do that".

186497.「それに比べて ここは 落ち着くなー。\n はじめて来たのに なんだか 懐かしい:
Compared to that, I feel more at home here.
Even though it's my first time here, it feels
so nostalgic.

186498.「なあ 父ちゃん。\n ここで一緒に 住むってのは どうだ？: Hey, Dad. How about we move in here together?

186499.「バカなこと 言うんじゃない。\n こんな危険な場所に 住めるわけないだろう。:
Don't be ridiculous. There's no way we could
live in such a dangerous place.

186502.「そんな世界に なったら\n こうして 一緒に出かけるのも いいな。:
When the world becomes a safer place, then it
would be nice to go out together like this.

186505.「……はっ！ こうしている場合ではない！\n 暴魔が 倒されたことを\n カイラ:
...Ah! Now's not the time for this! I have to
report to Chief Kairam that the demon has
been defeated.

186512.「あの魔物が 暴魔と思われるのですが \n 先ほどから ピクリとも 動かないので:
That demon hasn't moved at all for some
time now. Is it asleep...?

186513.「まるで 遺跡の一部が\n 魔物化したかのようです……。:
It's as if the ruins themselves have been
turned into a monster...

186515.「なんだか 不思議なチカラを\n 感じます……。: I feel some kind of mysterious power...

186518.「うぐっ……！\n <cs_pchero>殿……\n どうか 奴を 打ち倒してく:
Ugh...! <cs_pchero>, please...
You must defeat it...!

186520.「<cs_pchero>殿…… また あなたに\n 助けられてしまいました……。: You've saved our lives yet again...

186521.「この 妖しき風のようなものは\n 深海のほこらで 見たものと同じ……。\n こ:
This ghostly wind is the same as the one I
saw in the deep-sea shrine... Could this be
the source of that demon...?

186522.「なんと……？\n これは 魔瘴というものなのですか！？\n それが魔物に憑りつ:
What...? This is demon miasma!? You say it
controls monsters and gives birth to
demons...?

186523.「では……もしや\n あの石も 魔瘴に……？:
Then... does that mean that stone is also made
of demon miasma...?

186524.「<cs_pchero>殿……その話 後ほど\n 大神殿で くわしく お聞かせく:
<cs_pchero>... Please tell me more about
this back at the Sanctum.

186526.「なっ……！\n 魔瘴を 食らっただと……！？: Wha...! It's eating the demon miasma...!?

186528.「いったい あれは\n なんなんだ……？: What in the world was that...?

186529.「……とにかく いったん イーサの村に戻り\n ノグリット村長に 報告することに:
...Anyway, let's return to Ether Village and
report back to Chief Noglit.

186531.「<pc>殿 申し訳ありません。\n ルビーが 体調を崩してしまったので\n 先:
I am so sorry, <pc>. Ruby was
feeling sick, so I had to go on ahead of you.

186532.「あんなに 元気だったのに\n いったい どうしたことか……？\n 早く よくな:
Even though she was so healthy before... what
could have happened to her? I hope she gets
better soon...

186533.「……っと すみません。それでは 暴魔の正体が\n 魔瘴が憑いた 魔物だという話:
...Oh, sorry. Now, could you tell me more
about this demon miasma and how it possesses
monsters?<yesno><close>

186534.「このような時に 冗談はおやめください。\n 事は 一刻を争うのです。:
Please don't joke at a time like this. There
is no moment to lose.

186535.<pc>は 神獣パチャティカから\n聞いた話を トビアスに伝えた。:
<pc> told Tobias what they had
heard from Pachatika.

186536.「なんと……！ ナドラガ神の体内に\n 宿っていた魔瘴が ナドラガンド全土に\n:
What!? The demon miasma that was inside
Nadraga's body has scattered all across
Nadragand...!?

186537.「おまけに 何者かが 魔瘴のチカラを\n 集めていると……。:
And not only that, but someone, or something,
is gathering the power of the demon miasma...

186538.「そういえば アヴィーロ遺跡で 魔瘴を食らい \n 飛び去っていった魔物が いま:
Come to think of it, there was that creature
that ate the demon miasma and flew away back
at Aviro Ruins, wasn't there? Could it be...?

186539.「そして 再び現れたという 邪悪なる意志……。\n 奴が あの 魔瘴食らいを使っ:
And then there's the Evil Will that has
returned... if they're using that creature to
collect the demon miasma...

186540.「……くそッ！ これは 大変なことになったぞ。 \n 邪悪なる意志を見つけだし:
...Dammit! This is a big deal. The Evil Will
must be found and stopped...!

186541.「すぐに 全領界の者に このことを伝え\n 奴の捜索に あたりましょう。:
We must notify the other realms immediately
and begin a search.

186542.「邪悪なる意志の行方が わかり次第\n また ご連絡させていただきます。\n ご:
We'll contact you again as soon as we know
anything about the Evil Will's whereabouts.
Thank you for your cooperation.

186543.「協団長となった 今でも\n <pc>殿には 助けられてばかり……\n 私は 何:
Even now, as a leader of the cooperative, I am
constantly helped by you, <pc>...
Nothing has changed for me...

186544.「<pc>殿のように 強くなるため\n やはり 竜化の術を 体得しなければ……！:
If I am to become as strong as you, I must
master the art of dragonification...!

186545.「……かつて 私は エステラとともに\n ナダイアさまから 竜化の術を学んでいま:
...Before, I tried to learn the art of
dragonification from Nadaia, alongside
Estella.

186546.「しかし それは 困難を極め\n 私は ついに 術を 体得することが\n できな:
But it was so difficult that I could not
master it...

186547.「暴魔に立ち向かうには 竜化の術が必要……。\n 今一度 鍛錬を積み直し\n 必:
To confront these demons, we need the art of
dragonification... I will train once again and
master it for certain.

192170.「皆が安心して 外に出歩ける世界にしたいと\n 思っている。:
I want a world where everyone can walk outside
without worry.
